parts.text: I received a used purifier instead of a new
They're claiming my purchased purifier was a rental and want it back.
I was on a monthly plan but now they're saying it was a rental and want it back.
I thought I bought this purifier, but they're saying it was rented and taking it away.
Why are they taking back my purifier? I was paying for it monthly.
I've been paying good money for this water purifier, and now I'm told it was a rental and they're taking it back? I bought this on a monthly installment plan. Give me back my purifier immediately.
